fields.name: **omg Is That Superman?!?!? (passive)**:
fields.value: Investigative results on you will be told you're superman

fields.name: Protector of noone good (Passive):
fields.value: All attacks on unseen members are redirected to you, reducing your Defense Power based on their Attack Power, and for every 1 Defense power you lose, gain .1 Attack Power

fields.name: Laser eyes:
fields.value: reduce a players Defense power by your Attack Power
